name: Team Tiger
description:
Welcome to our Game!

MOUNTAIN VILLAGE IS A SANDBOX PUZZLER SET IN A HAPPY REMOTE VILLAGE WHERE NOTHING IS WHAT IT SEEMS. TALK TO THE VILLAGERS, EXPLORE THE TOWN AND FIND CLUES TO FIGURE A WAY OUT OF TOWN BEFORE YOU’RE FORCED TO RELIVE THE SAME DAY AGAIN... 

https://forms.gle/hZWwvN6Q1BZJCZtn7

Fill out our form! When you finish playing of course
